title: Elementor Page Builder Tutorial
description: Master the Elementor page builder to create beautiful WordPress pages.

blocks.content: Elementor is a powerful drag-and-drop page builder for WordPress that revolutionizes the way you create content. With its intuitive interface and extensive features, you can design professional-looking pages without any coding knowledge.

The Elementor interface consists of two main parts:

  • The preview area where you see your changes in real-time
  • The panel on the left containing all your widgets and settings

author: admin
